title: Membership Framework YMCA CodeShare Sandboxes
description: Welcome to the Membership Framework demo site! Compare the three themes currently offered on YMCA CodeShare and discover the range of capabilities across different installation levels of the platform.
intro: Welcome to the Membership Framework YMCA CodeShare demo site! Compare the three themes currently offered on YMCA CodeShare and discover the range of capabilities across different installation levels of the platform.

cards.title: Rose: Standard Membership Framework install
cards.description: Membership Framework on Standard-level YMCA CodeShare offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Rose offers sprawling site menu options and high accessibility for blind or low vision users.

cards.title: Lily: Standard Membership Framework install
cards.description: Membership Framework on Standard-level YMCA CodeShare offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Lily offers bold banner headings and eye-catching tiles to organize child page content.

cards.title: Carnation: Standard Membership Framework install
cards.description: Membership Framework on Standard-level YMCA CodeShare offers everything a YMCA Association needs for a comprehensive website. Carnation offers image-rich page layouts and simple, mobile-optimized menus.
